title: Remove orange background behind header logo/brand lockup

requirements.text: Remove the orange/gold button-style background that appears behind the header logo/brand lockup by overriding the global button background styles for the logo button only (the element with class `header-brand-btn` in `frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx`). The header background and the logo/brand position/size behavior (including the scroll-compress behavior) must remain unchanged, and other header buttons (Cart/Dashboard/Admin/Login/Logout) must keep their existing styling.

quotes: Remove the orange colour background button which is behind logo and brandname image
It is orange colour container behind logo/brandname
no, just remove orange colour behind logo not the header background

acceptanceCriteria: On all pages, the clickable logo/brand area in the header has no colored/gradient background behind it (transparent), including on hover/focus/active states.
The header container background remains unchanged.
The logo/brand remains in the same position and retains the same sizing/scroll-compress behavior as before.
Other header navigation/auth buttons retain their existing (gold shimmer) styling.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui/*.
nonGoals: Do not redesign the header layout, spacing, or navigation.
Do not change the logo image asset or replace it.
Do not change the styling of non-logo header buttons.
